ModMetaData.name: Prison Breaks Upgraded
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Configure prison breaks based on mood threshold and terror level (Ideology). Toggle mood checking, use terror-based prevention, or combine both. Default prevents breaks when prisoners are happy.
Note: Settings changes require a game restart to take effect.
Fork of "Configurable Prison Breaks" by nigel (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3227325698)
